Welcome to Distributed Automated Parameter Testing’s documentation!¶

DAP¶

This is __init__.py

Box¶

Class that allows for access to the box API and methods to directly upload files

class dap.box.Box(config=None)¶

Class which allows for connection to box API

Parameters:config (Config) – Config object with config file
capture()¶

Flask page: box redirect url which contains the code and state used to get access and refress token

Returns:String containing HTML to be displayed with box login credentials
connect()¶

Tries to connect to box using arguments provided in Config and starts server for authorization if not.

Returns:Box client if successful
end()¶

Flask page: shuts down flask server

Returns:String containing HTML to be displayed
index()¶

Flask page: index of the web server and serves as the start point for authentication

Returns:String containing HTML to be displayed
startServer()¶

Method that starts flask to start authorization process

Returns:Box client which can be used to access authorized user data
updateTokens(access_token)¶

Refresh the access and refresh token given a valid access token

Parameters:access_token (string) – box access token to be refreshed
Returns:Box client
uploadFile(folderID, path, name)¶

Upload a file to box using the current client

Parameters:
  • folderID (string) – the box folder ID that the file should be added to (found in URL)
  • path (string) – the path to the file on your local machine
  • file (string) – the name of the file you wish to upload

Config¶

Class that allows for reading and modification of a config file.

class dap.config.Config(path)¶

Class which loads and allows for editing of a config file

Parameters:path (string) – path to config file
Returns:Dictionary of config file
static changeConfig(path, key, value)¶

Change value for a given key in the given file path

Parameters:
  • path (string) – the path to the config file
  • key (string) – key to be changed
  • value (string) – value to inserted at key
Returns:

Dictionary of config file
change_config(key, value)¶

Change value for a given key in the config file

Parameters:
  • key (string) – key to be changed
  • value (string) – value to inserted at key
Returns:

Dictionary of config file
static create(path='config.txt')¶

Creates a config file with the reserved keys inserted.

Parameters:path (string) – path where config file will be writen
static readConfig(path)¶

Reads in the config file and interprets it as a dictionary

Parameters:path (string) – path to config file
Returns:Dictionary of config file
read_config()¶

Reads the file with path set to self.path

Returns:Dictionary of config file
static safe(path='config.txt')¶

Safe config file by removing accessToken and refressToken.

Parameters:path (string) – path where config file will be writen
